docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: Node.js
docs.text: Below this is the explanation about node js and its framework

docs.title: Setup Node JS
docs.text:
How to setup node js

Documentations

To see the documentations, go to Node JS Official Website

Installations

Windows using powershell

winget install Schniz.fnm
fnm use --install-if-missing 20
node -v # should print `v20.16.0`
npm -v # should print `10.8.1`

Linux

curl -fsSL https://fnm.vercel.app/install | bash
source ~/.bashrc
fnm use --install-if-missing 20
node -v # should print `v20.16.0`
npm -v # should print `10.8.1`

docs.title: Docker
docs.text: To see the documentations, go to Docker Official Docs

docs.title: Setup Docker
docs.text:
Installations

sudo apt update
sudo apt install apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl software-properties-common
curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/debian/gpg | sudo gpg --dearmor -o /usr/share/keyrings/docker-archive-keyring.gpg
echo "deb [arch=amd64 signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/docker-archive-keyring.gpg] https://download.docker.com/linux/debian $(lsb_release -cs) stable" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null
sudo apt update
sudo apt install docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io
sudo systemctl start docker
sudo systemctl enable docker
sudo docker run hello-world
